title: Is keeping hands on chest for a sec after saying Allahuakbar to join congregation from Sunnah
transcript: [Music] yes sir my question is if i'm joining a congressional prayer and the imam is in the lupus for youth so i will say i will raise my hand saying allah and i have seen some people keep it on chest for a moment then they go down or i come late so i stand in the room i say allahu akbar i see people doing this and putting their hands on their chest for a second then say allahu akbar and go for is this from the sun you just say allahu akbar allahu akbar and go or and go this allah for the takbir of movement you
